channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fridge on street, 10th December
item.description:
It’s been on Denmark Road for a week, just opposite Denmark Fish Bar on Denmark Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): County Grove, Camberwell, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Large bags of shrubbery cuttings, 10th December
item.description:
These 2 bags of shrubbery pruning debris has been on the street for 2 weeks. I’ve emailed the agents for Orchard House but they haven’t been moved yet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): County Grove, Camberwell, Greater London

Its a fire hazard and needs to be removed

item.title: There is a large dangerous hole on the pavebtb, 10th December
item.description:
There is a very large hole along the pavement. It is very gangrenous an adult foot and a child can get stuck on it.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bag and metal dumped with garden wastes, 10th December
item.description:
It looks like it’s metals poles and bags of rubbish and also bags of garden waste. I nearest fell over it. It’s a trip hazard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hertford Road, Hackney, London

item.title: 2 large sofas on a main pathway, 9th December
item.description:
Someone has left 2 sofas on the path along the main road. Unsure if it's someone that is a resident of the flats at 46 Combedale or someone else in the surrounding area as people that aren't residents of the flat seem to always use these bins aswell

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combedale Road, Greenwich

item.title: Blocked drain, 9th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Acacia Way, Blackfen, Greater London
